name: Christmas Angel
description:
Angel candle available in wood texture or wool texture and are unscented. 
Burns for approx 15 Hrs

180 mm wide X 35 mm think x 170 mm high.

name: Christmas snowball
description:
Snowball candle unscented candle.
Burns for approx 18 Hrs
Ø70 mm

name: Boho Candle - Illume
description:
This collection draws inspiration from exotic locales, white sands plus bright, mixed patterns and prints. These Boho jars are filled with our all-natural wax and our best fragrances.

Burn time: Approx. 70 hours
Size:  100 MM DIA x 140 MM H

name: Retro Tin - Illume
description:
This retro decorative tin is made from 100% natural soy blend with beeswax and essential oils. Each tin design is selected to match the scent of the candle.

Burn Time: Approx. 35 Hours

name: Essential Tin - Illume
description:
This charming simple design features our new all-natural
blend of coconut wax, beeswax and essential oils.

Burn Time : Approx. 45 hours
9 cm diameter x 9 cm high

name: Colour Block Tin - Illume
description:
Make a fashionable statement in any home. These candles are crafted with our all-natural blend of coconut wax, bees wax and essential oils with two wicks for optimal burning. 

Tin features an embossed lid and decorative colours to match the scent

Burn time : Approx. 35 hours 
Size: 115 MM DIA x 95 MM H

name: French Jam Jars
description:
These French made Jam Jars will bring back memories of wintry Thursdays, of golden coloured biscuits for trips to the park, barley sugar and melting toffee for the fairground.
Available in a range of fragrances of your favorite jam flavors.

Quince Rhubarb:
Mixture of blackcurrant, Quince, Rhubarb and Vanilla.

Apricot Almond:
Strawberry Syrup, Apricot puree and vanilla.

Cherries:
Blackcurrant, cherries, Raspberry and vanilla.

Burn for approx 38 Hours
Dimensions: Ø90 mm - H85 mm

name: Lucia - Soy candle
description:
Where the past and the future meet in the present.
Lucia was inspired by the unforgettable memories of traditions past and by the clean, sensuous modernity of the future. Here in the present rare fragrant smells, beautiful colors and intriguing textures make these little wonders look like precious perfumed jewels. 

Blended with pure essential oils and natural 100% organic Soy. 

Burns for over 50 hours.

Dimension: 75mm W x H 90mm

Made in Canada.

Fragrances:

Goats Milk and Linseed:
Linseed Flower and sweet Vanilla extract.

Mandarin & Tomato flower:
Garden fresh accord of Mandarin & Tomato Flower.

Pomegranate & Redcurrant:
Highly fresh and clean aromatic blend of pomegranate and redcurrant.

Thyme flower & Coriander:
Exquisite floral blend of thyme flower and coriander.

Laurel leaf & Olive:
Soothing and uplifting laurel leaf & olive.

Tea leaf & Honey flower:
Bouquet of freshly grown Tea Leaf and Honey Flower.

Fig & wild ginger:
Exotic blend of fresh Fig and wild Ginger.

Sea Watercress & Chai tea:
A sensual infusion of sea watercress and Chai tea blended.

Bourbon vanilla & white tea:
Enjoy the natural and warm fragrance of Bourbon Vanilla and White Tea.

Damask rose & Cyprus:
Natural extracts of Damask Rose and Cypress.

name: Aromatherapy jars
description:
This lovely aromatherapy shaped jar burns for about 60 hours and gives off a great scent throw and is made from all natural soy wax.

Size : 69MM W X 98MM H

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

Creme Brulee - A Sweet, vanilla bean scent combined with a caramelised sugar and buttery cream.

Pink Grapefruit - Sun-sweetened grapefruit touched with fresh orange and tangerine citrus with a touch of sweetness.

Cherry Blossom - Floral fresh cherry blossom combined with an end note of subtle musk.

Green tea & Lemongrass - A fresh, clean fragrance built around lemongrass blends with a herbal heart of Green Tea. 

Lavender Fields - Earthy lavender with light floral and spring accords.

Mango - A fresh, fruity ripe mango scent with a touch of vanilla.

name: Frosted glass candles
description:
This simple frosted glass candle burns up to 50 hours and is made with all natural soy wax. It also has a great scent throw to fill a room with your desired fragrance. 

Size : 80MM W X 83MM H

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

Creme Brulee - A Sweet, vanilla bean scent combined with a caramelised sugar and buttery cream.

Pink Grapefruit - Sun-sweetened grapefruit touched with fresh orange and tangerine citrus with a touch of sweetness.

Cherry Blossom - Floral fresh cherry blossom combined with an end note of subtle musk.

Green tea & Lemongrass - A fresh, clean fragrance built around lemongrass blends with a herbal heart of Green Tea. 

Lavender Fields - Earthy lavender with light floral and spring accords.

Mango - A fresh, fruity ripe mango scent with a touch of vanilla.

name: Cook's Candle
description:
These cook's candles are great for the kitchen. Burn one of these for an hour or more after cooking and these will get rid of the unwanted odors. 

Burn Time: 30 Hours

name: Candle Melts
description:
These soy candle melts are great for oil burners and are available in a variety of fragrances. 
1 melt will burn for approx 5 hours.

These are sold in a box for 4.

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

Creme Brulee - A Sweet, vanilla bean scent combined with a caramelised sugar and buttery cream.

Pink Grapefruit - Sun-sweetened grapefruit touched with fresh orange and tangerine citrus with a touch of sweetness.

Green tea & Lemongrass - A fresh, clean fragrance built around lemongrass blends with a herbal heart of Green Tea. 

Lavender Fields - Earthy lavender with light floral and spring accords.

Mango - A fresh, fruity ripe mango scent with a touch of vanilla.

options.name: Candle Melt in Green tea and lemongrass

name: Tealights
description:
Soy Tealights available in any fragrances below and with the option of having them coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Sold in a pack of 6.

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

name: 3 Wick candle
description:
All natural soy wax and cotton wicks used in this 3 wick candle. These 3 wick candles look great on a coffee table or side table as they are a little different to your standard single wick candles.

Burn time: 60 hours +

Size : 70 MM H X 125 MM DIA

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

Creme Brulee - A Sweet, vanilla bean scent combined with a caramelised sugar and buttery cream.

Pink Grapefruit - Sun-sweetened grapefruit touched with fresh orange and tangerine citrus with a touch of sweetness.

description:
Natural soy wax candles in a silver or gold cracked glass. Perfect for bedrooms and living areas for something a bit more decorative.

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

name: Pillar Candles
description:
These all natural soy candles are great to set the mood with a nice fragrance and soft lighting. These candle lasts from 60 hours of burning to 160 hours of burning depending on which size you are looking at.

Sizes available : 

Small : 76MM W X 88MM H
Medium : 76MM W X 165MM H
Large : 76x 150mm

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour that matches the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

name: French antique jar with lid
description:
These antique jars look great in any environment they are stylish and fill a large room with a nice soft scent and last up to 50 hours of burning for the tall jar and up to 60 hours of burning for the squat jar.

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

name: Oil Burner
description:
Place a tealight candle on the base in the centre of the oil burner and in the top bowl section place your favorite scented oil or candle melt to create a soft soothing scent.
Available in white

name: Silver Lotus
description: This Decorative chrome lotus tealight holder is great for any where in the home for a little bit of elegance.

name: Triple Silver Mottle Candles
description:
When lit these 3 silver mottle glasses give off a soft pretty light, the 3 glasses sit on top of a dark piece of wood making a nice neat display. 
There is an option to use the mottle glasses purely as tealight holders and not filled with soy wax.

Dimensions: 10cm wide x 12cm height x 30cm length 

If you choose the option to have the glasses filled you can pick from the below fragrances and will burn for 50 hours each.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

Creme Brulee - A Sweet, vanilla bean scent combined with a caramelised sugar and buttery cream.

Pink Grapefruit - Sun-sweetened grapefruit touched with fresh orange and tangerine citrus with a touch of sweetness.

Cherry Blossom - Floral fresh cherry blossom combined with an end note of subtle musk.

Green tea & Lemongrass - A fresh, clean fragrance built around lemongrass blends with a herbal heart of Green Tea. 

Lavender Fields - Earthy lavender with light floral and spring accords.

Mango - A fresh, fruity ripe mango scent with a touch of vanilla.

options.name: Filled in Green tea and lemongrass

name: Layla and Lily tealight holders
description:
Layla Mirror tealight holders in either triple tealight holder or single tealight holder.
Lily triple tealight holder with textured mirror

name: 3 Part Lily
description:
These gorgeous 3 part lilies are great for dining, living and bedrooms and available in 2 colours, taupe and white.
Sizes:
Small : H 100 MM x W 215 MM x L 215MM
Large : H 150 MM X W 300MM X L 300 MM

options.name: Small 3 Part lily in Metallic Black
Large 3 part lily in Metallic blakc

name: Faro Tealight holders
description:
These exquisitely shaped tealight holders come in 2 different styles; frosted glass with a brushed aluminium finish or a clear glass with a polished aluminium finish.
These products are hand made in Germany and available in 3 sizes;
Small : 190 MM H X 50 MM DIA
Medium : 210 MM H X 50 MM DIA
Large : 230 MM H X 50 MM DIA

name: Aura Tealight holder
description:
Frosted handmade glass and stainless steel tealight holder in 2 sizes.

Small :  50 MM H X 140 MM DIA
Large : 65 MM H X 180 MM DIA

name: Reed Diffuser
description:
This reed diffuser is a great way to scent an area without having to light it. These diffusers will last up to a year before you need to replace the oil.

Comes in all fragrances listed below as well as a choice to have coloured in a colour to match the fragrance.

Strawberry Champagne - A delicious mix of strawberries, champagne with an end note of roses and raspberries.

Pink Grapefruit - Sun-sweetened grapefruit touched with fresh orange and tangerine citrus with a touch of sweetness.

Cherry Blossom - Floral fresh cherry blossom combined with an end note of subtle musk.

Lavender Fields - Earthy lavender with light floral and spring accords.
